Class Color

java.lang.Object
io.github.syst3ms.skriptparser.util.color.Color
public class Color extends Object
Represents a color, written like #xxxxxx or with an RGB format.

      public static Color of(long hex, boolean isAlpha)
      The Color instance of given hex value.
      Parameters:
      hex - the hexadecimal value
      isAlpha - whether or not the alpha parameter is present
      Returns:
      a new Color instance
